name: VelaflameskillforAmazonAlexa
0:
”Alexa, turn on night-light”
”Turn night-light color to blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Velaflame skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to choose from a variety of colors to match your mood and set timers to automatically turn your candles on or off. Whether you're creating a cozy ambiance, celebrating a special occasion, or just adding a touch of magic to your home, this skill makes managing your Velaflame candles convenient and fun. Just ask Alexa to handle the lighting while you sit back and enjoy!
